group_1.textCenter: Huuuh? Where did I put my phone again...
You remember that, Hiko-kun?
......[wait:0.8][chara:102801:lipSynch_1][chara:102801:cheek_0][chara:102801:face_mtn_ex_050.exp3.json][chara:102801:motion_400]Oh, right.
I left all my stuff on the living room sofa.
Aha, here it is! Thanks lots!â˜…
Okay, lemme just text them again...
[chara:102801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
Shit! It's flooding with notifications!
Uhhh, I got one from Sasha...one from the@Instructor, and Miyurin too...
Yeah... I'll check it out, 'kay?
......[wait:0.8][chara:102801:lipSynch_1][chara:102801:cheek_0][chara:102801:face_mtn_ex_050.exp3.json]Ah...

group_1.narration: Sorry I missed your call!@Did something happen, Hime-chan?@Please get back to me whenever you like ^_^
If it's an emergency, I'm always there for you.
i'll be right over too, so anything you need,@just let miyu know!

group_1.textCenter: What...? They're all worried about me...?
I mean, that makes sense...
I was all beggin' for attention just a bit ago...
It's not 'cause they're all avoiding this cutie,
that they didn't reply to me...
Guess it's just a misunderstanding like you said,@Hiko-kun...?
*Sigh*... Just look at cute lil' me, raging around all@by my lonesome...
This needy cutie's loud charm points? Backfired for sure...
And still no responses from Shigurin and Hagurin...
Yeah... I gotcha.
The sitch was pretty like when I was gettin' the@cold shoulder from everyone, sure,
but this cutie still flipped like crazy bad back there...
But I mean... It's all 'cause I seriously love everyone@and didn't want them to leave, right?
If I really like, barfed them out with all that,
I wanna say sorry for all my texts and calls, and like,@get stuff back to normal...
Wait... What?
...[wait:0.8][chara:102801:lipSynch_1][chara:102801:cheek_0][chara:102801:face_mtn_ex_030.exp3.json]Ah, now that you mention it...

group_1.textLeft: Tomorrow, let's all go over to Sasha's place to@hang!

group_1.textRight: Ah, tomorrow...?@I'm not sure if I'll be able to clean up in time...
Miyu and I have Youth Association activities to@attend to...

group_1.textLeft: The two of us also have Drama Club preparations@to do tomorrow...
The rehearsal of our joint performance with@another school is coming up,
so we can't really take a day off...

group_1.textRight: Me too... I've been called in to help out.

group_1.textCenter: To begin with, all of 'em told me from the very start@they might not be able to make it.
I probably shouldn't've pushed the date just 'cause@they're so sweet to me...
...True, I gotta apologize for that too.
That said, just saying sorry isn't going to satisfy@this cutie.
It's like, I wanna plan something and totally pump@up everybody's spirits, y'know?
...Huh? You mean, that stuff from Grade 6?
...Oh, yeah! It was all the rage for the boys to tease@the girls like, super weirdly.
Even after those guys apologized, the vibes in the@class were still awful.
The school festival was also coming up, and 'cause@of the awkwardness,
they decided to throw a huge party and make a@buncha noise to break down the wall,
and it worked like, super well...
Yup... Right on!
Actions really, like, speak louder than words, yeah?
I'm giving it a shot! Thankies, Hiko-kun!â˜…
